title: Land with houses for sale in Kottawa
details:
Width: 57 feets.
1Km ahead from Kottawa town.
Facing to the Kottawa- Horana main road.
Water and electricity provided.
There are 5 separate houses in the land.
(with separate water and electricity.)
This is suitable for residence or commercial perposes.
Price is negotiable.
Full land for urgent sale.
